languages.text: {n}Невротически дернув бледной щекой, Инцендия решительно кивает вам.{/n} "Мы оказались в мрачном месте, {name}. Я страшусь при мысли, какие ужасы здесь таятся. Надеюсь, нам хватит сил, чтобы исполнить свой долг перед людьми Простора".

{n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."
languages.original_text: {n}Невротически дернув бледной щекой, Инцендия решительно кивает вам.{/n} "Мы оказались в мрачном месте, {name}. Я страшусь при мысли, какие ужасы здесь таятся. Надеюсь, нам хватит сил, чтобы исполнить свой долг перед людьми Простора".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

{n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

{n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

{n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

languages.text: {n}Mit einem neurotischen Zucken auf ihrer blassen Wange nickt dir Incendia entschlossen zu.{/n} "Wir befinden uns ein einem dunklen Ort, {name}. Der Gedanke an die Schrecken, die hier lauern, macht mir Angst. Ich hoffe nur, dass wir die Stärke haben, unsere Pflicht gegenüber den Bewohnern der Ausdehnung zu erfüllen."
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem neurotischen Zucken auf ihrer blassen Wange nickt dir Incendia entschlossen zu.{/n} "Wir befinden uns ein einem dunklen Ort, {name}. Der Gedanke an die Schrecken, die hier lauern, macht mir Angst. Ich hoffe nur, dass wir die Stärke haben, unsere Pflicht gegenüber den Bewohnern der Ausdehnung zu erfüllen."

languages.text: {n}Alors qu'un tic nerveux agite sa joue pâle, Incendia opine du chef d'un air résolu.{/n} « Nous avons atterri dans un endroit bien sinistre, {name}. Je frémis à la seule pensée des horreurs tapies en ces lieux. Reste à espérer que nous aurons la force d'accomplir notre devoir envers les citoyens des Étendues. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors qu'un tic nerveux agite sa joue pâle, Incendia opine du chef d'un air résolu.{/n} « Nous avons atterri dans un endroit bien sinistre, {name}. Je frémis à la seule pensée des horreurs tapies en ces lieux. Reste à espérer que nous aurons la force d'accomplir notre devoir envers les citoyens des Étendues. »

languages.text: {n}青白い頬を神経質に痙攣させながら、インセンディアは毅然とした態度であなたにうなずく。{/n}「我らのいる場所は残酷な場所だ、{name}。ここに棲む恐怖を思うだけで恐ろしくなる。我々に、エクスパンスの人々への責務を果たせるだけの力があることを願うばかりだ」
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}青白い頬を神経質に痙攣させながら、インセンディアは毅然とした態度であなたにうなずく。{/n}「我らのいる場所は残酷な場所だ、{name}。ここに棲む恐怖を思うだけで恐ろしくなる。我々に、エクスパンスの人々への責務を果たせるだけの力があることを願うばかりだ」

languages.text: {n}Con un tic neurótico en su pálida mejilla, Incendia asiente con decisión.{/n} «Nos encontramos en un lugar siniestro, {name}. Me aterra pensar en los horrores que acechan aquí. Solo espero que tengamos la fuerza necesaria para cumplir con nuestro deber hacia la gente de la Extensión».
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un tic neurótico en su pálida mejilla, Incendia asiente con decisión.{/n} «Nos encontramos en un lugar siniestro, {name}. Me aterra pensar en los horrores que acechan aquí. Solo espero que tengamos la fuerza necesaria para cumplir con nuestro deber hacia la gente de la Extensión».

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅苍白的脸颊神经质般地抽搐着，她坚定地向你点了点头。{/n}“我们目前身处邪恶之地，{name}。光是想想这里的恐怖之物，就让我心怀恐惧。我只希望我们拥有足够的力量，能够为科罗努斯扩区的人民履行职责。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅苍白的脸颊神经质般地抽搐着，她坚定地向你点了点头。{/n}“我们目前身处邪恶之地，{name}。光是想想这里的恐怖之物，就让我心怀恐惧。我只希望我们拥有足够的力量，能够为科罗努斯扩区的人民履行职责。”

languages.text: {n}Solgun yanağı sinirsel sebeplerle seğiren İncendia, kararlı bir edayla seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Kendimizi acıması olmayan bir yerde bulduk {name}. Burada kol gezen dehşetleri düşünmek bile içimi korkuyla dolduruyor. Tek dileğim, Enginlik'teki insanlara karşı vazifemizi yerine getirecek güce sahip olmamız."
languages.original_text: {n}With a neurotic twitch of her pale cheek, Incendia offers you a resolute nod.{/n} "We find ourselves in a grim place, {name}. It frightens me to think of the horrors that dwell here. I only hope that we have the strength to fulfil our duty to the people of the Expanse."
